verbose_text: Oven et al. [XREF_BIBR] observed that cobalt metal treatment to a Co-hyperaccumulator, namely Crotalaria cobalticola, and non accumulators, Raufolia serpentina and Silene cucubalus, resulted in an enhancement of citrate, indicating its participation in the heavy metal ion complex formation.
evidence: cobalt metal treatment to a Co-hyperaccumulator, namely Crotalaria cobalticola, and non-accumulators, Raufolia serpentina and Silene cucubalus, resulted in an enhancement of citrate
